long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
📊 Instagram™ Sorter: Elevate Your Social Feed!

Tired of scrolling endlessly through reels? 🌀 Let our extension do the heavy lifting! Our Chrome extension organizes reels based on key metrics like comments 💬, likes 👍, and views 👁️‍🗨️.

✨ Features:

Top Content: Quickly find the most popular and engaging reels.
Custom Sorting: Tailor your feed to show reels with the highest interactions.
Streamlined Browsing: Save time and enhance your social media experience!

Upgrade your feed with ReelSorter and stay ahead of the trends! 🚀
